name: resource_progression_order_of_operations
goal: Use this dependency checklist to plan any tool- or weapon-related objective from an empty inventory.
required_items: A nearby tree or other wood source
Fuel for smelting (coal, charcoal, or equivalent)
notes: General rule: always satisfy material/tool prerequisites first. If a requested target is missing prerequisites, expand the plan backward until all dependencies can be completed from current inventory and nearby resources.

steps.title: Resolve target into prerequisite chain
steps.details: Identify the requested end item/action, then build a backward dependency chain. Example pattern: target item -> required tier tool -> required smelted materials -> required ore -> required lower tier tool -> required base wood materials.
checks: Each dependency mapped to a supported action

steps.title: Establish base crafting materials
steps.details: Gather wood first. Convert logs into planks and sticks, and craft a crafting table if needed. Ensure enough base materials exist for all intermediate tools, not only the final target.
checks: Have planks and sticks for intermediate and final crafts

steps.title: Progress tool tiers in order
steps.details: Craft and equip lower-tier tools before attempting higher-tier resources. Generic progression: wooden pickaxe -> stone pickaxe -> iron pickaxe -> diamond mining capability.
checks: Current tool tier can harvest the next required resource
Tool equipped before mining gated resource

steps.title: Gather ores and smelt before gated crafts
steps.details: Mine required ore with the correct tool tier, then smelt into ingots/materials before attempting recipes that require processed materials.
checks: All raw ores converted to required processed materials
Smelting fuel and furnace availability confirmed

steps.title: Craft final target and verify completion
steps.details: After prerequisites are complete, craft the requested final item(s), equip or place as needed, and verify objective completion against the original request.
